content.html: If this was my car, I’d be so upset. Not stealing someone’s life in my name. I’m sad that the victim in this case felt that their property was equally valued with a child’s whole adult life. But more slaves for Angola prison, am I right?
content.value:
If this was my car, I’d be so upset. Not stealing someone’s life in my name. I’m sad that the victim in this case felt that their property was equally valued with a child’s whole adult life. 

But more slaves for Angola prison, am I right?
